pages.text: Illagers higher in rank and prestige than Evokers. Indeed, they are most likely to be the leader of the Illager tribe they are a part of. Ministers are notorious for plundering civilizations and their oratory skills, which they use to empower other Illagers or to viciously mock their foes.

pages.title: Minister's Staff
pages.text: It is said that the Staff they wield is either inspired by or plundered and modified from a nameless kingdom, with the staff's orb radiating great magic. Ministers are also good at blocking hits with their staff, though unfortunately for them, their staffs aren't as durable as a standard shield. Perhaps there's a way to plunder the staff, or at the very least, its orb, without destroying it...
